result.title: Full-stack Engineer
result.description:
Job Responsibility:
- Develop front end website architecture.
- Design user interactions on web pages.
- Develop back end website applications.
- Create servers and databases for functionality.
- Ensure cross-platform optimization for mobile phones.

Job Requirements:
- 3+ years of experiece
-Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. 
-Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Angular JS, React, and Amber. 
-Proficiency in server side Java language and Spring framework.
result.notes: You can submit the application on our website OR send your resume to service@talentseer.com
